leibei, thanks for the leads! I don't care if it's in Russian or in Martian, as long as I can see the game! Who cares if it's missing 7 minutes? I can miss 7 minutes or I can miss the whole game by reading the score on line. At 10 GB, I won't see it until next month anyway. 

So thanks for the leads, I'm downloading it in Russian. That's better than a file that will complete in October! :)
